quote: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Those who say it cannot be done should not interrupt the person doing it.
author: Someone

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Never memorize something that you can look up.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
author: Robert F. Kennedy

quote: There are no limits. There are only plateaus. And you must not stay there. You must go beyond them.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The man who asks a question is a fool for a minute, the man who does not ask is a fool for life.
author: Confucius

quote: Courage isn't having the strength to go on – it is going on when you don't have strength.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it.
author: Salvador Dalí

quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
author: Jack London

quote: Education: the path from cocky ignorance to miserable uncertainty.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: There is nothing permanent except change.
author: Heraclitus
